dublinCore.dc:title: 113 SRES 180 ATS: Making minority party appointments for the 113th Congress.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. McConnell submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: Making minority party appointments for the 113th Congress.

section.text: That the following be the minority membership on the following committees for the remainder of the 113th Congress, or until their successors are appointed:

header.committee-name: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Thune, Mr. Wicker, Mr. Blunt, Mr. Rubio, Ms. Ayotte, Mr. Heller, Mr. Coats, Mr. Scott, Mr. Cruz, Mrs. Fischer, Mr. Johnson of Wisconsin, and Mr. Chiesa.

header.committee-name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Coburn, Mr. McCain, Mr. Johnson, Mr. Portman, Mr. Paul, Mr. Enzi, Ms. Ayotte, and Mr. Chiesa.

header.committee-name: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Risch, Mr. Vitter, Mr. Rubio, Mr. Paul, Mr. Scott, Mrs. Fischer, Mr. Enzi, Mr. Johnson of Wisconsin, and Mr. Chiesa.
